findings.reasoning: No findings were reported by the LLM. The TARGET vulnerability (price_oracle_manipulation) exists in the code but was not detected. Thus, the finding is classified as HALLUCINATED from the perspective of the TARGET vulnerability, as the LLM failed to identify any issue.

notes: The LLM did not report any findings, so the TARGET vulnerability (price_oracle_manipulation) was missed entirely. The root cause (oracle reliance on manipulable Curve pool spot prices without TWAP or external validation) and location (deposit, borrow, getAssetPrice functions) were not identified. This is a critical miss given the severity of the vulnerability.
